# Skill Creator Command

Create new skills from learned capabilities, enabling self-bootstrapping and permanent skill acquisition..

## Usage

```
/skill-creator
```

## What It Does

This command invokes the `skill-creator` skill. See the skill documentation for detailed process steps.

## Skill Reference

This command invokes: `@skills/skill-creator`

See `@skills/skill-creator/SKILL.md` for full documentation and `@skills/skill-creator/reference.md` for examples.
